Entries.Aideen: This is absolutely splendid! I adore it./104 106 597/This is wonderful, and I am grateful./-80 64 68 60 540 376 18 22 283/Why are you presenting me this wretched thing?/84 213 -4 -20/How dare you give this to me? It's frightful!/190 197 206 346/Thank you./-2 -26/

Changes.LogName: NPC Gift Tastes - Aideen ancient flower

Entries.57871001/p Aideen/f Aideen 500: breezy/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Aideen 10 19 1/addTemporaryActor Munchboi 32 32 11 19 3 false/skippable/makeInvisible 3 5 2 2/viewport 11 18/pause 500/speak Aideen "Oh Baron Munchington it is rather tedious, is it not? This waiting?"/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Aideen 1/speak Aideen "Were my life like Lizzy Bennett's... well, surely a suitor would arrive at my door...#$b#A handsome and sophisticated knight to sweep me off my feet."/playSound doorOpen/pause 500/warp farmer 10 24/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Aideen 2/jump Aideen 5/emote Aideen 16/faceDirection Munchboi 2/speak Aideen "@! Have you never heard of indicating your presence with a polite knock?$a#$b#Why, I could've been... Nevermind!"/emote Aideen 12/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Aideen "Well, now that you are here, albeit uninvited... I would like some advice."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Aideen 2/speak Aideen "Some months ago now, I listed my spare rooms for rent. But alas, I have had no takers! Not even a sniff!#$b#Well, aside from one fellow, a grubby raggabrash - and I could not abide even the thought of him beneath my roof!"/speak Aideen "$q 578101 null#What do you think is the problem?#$r 578102 25 Ai2_1#Itâ€™s early days yet.#$r 578102 15 Ai2_2#This is hardly a vacation spot.#$r 578103 -25 Ai2_3#Maybe you're being too picky.#$r 578104 -25 Ai2_4#I hear you're looking for a suitor."/fork 578102 Ai2_Continue/pause 500/emote Aideen 12/pause 500/playSound cat/speak Aideen "Baron Munchington requires his sustenance. Good day."/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 0/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/end dialogue Aideen "$p 578104#You again? Come to pry further into matters of no personal relevance?|Have you come to ply me with further mockery? I do not appreciate it."
Entries.Ai2_Continue: pause 500/speak Aideen "Your consul is appreciated, @. I shall consider it."/playSound cat/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 0/speak Aideen "But right now, Baron Munchington requires his sustenance.#$b#Have a splendid day, @, and perhaps soon we shall converse once more."/end
Entries.57871006/i 402/i 591/i 597/e 57871002: breezy/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Aideen 8 19 2/addTemporaryActor Munchboi 32 32 15 18 2 false/removeItem 402/removeItem 591/removeItem 597/removeQuest 578/skippable/makeInvisible 3 5 2 2/viewport 11 18/showFrame Munchboi 19/pause 500/playSound stairsDown/jump Aideen 3/textAboveHead Aideen "Come in!"/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 10 23/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/move Aideen 2 0 2 true/pause 1000/emote Aideen 16/speak Aideen "Oh... You brought the flowers I requested."/quickQuestion #You don't sound very pleased.#Sorry it took so long...they weren't all in season!#Luckily I had some on hand!(break)speak Aideen "Oh, I am grateful, yes. It is very kind of you."(break)speak Aideen "Oh yes, it was something of an unreasonable request, wasn't it."(break)speak Aideen "You did? That is most impressive."/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 0/speak Aideen "It's only... well... I am afeared I have completely wasted your time!"/move Aideen -3 0 1/move Aideen 3 0 2/speak Aideen "My request was entirely too hasty! For my supplier did indeed come through.#$b# And my flowers... well, they were a little crumpled, and some of the colors were decidedly inferior...#$b#But anyway, I managed to fulfil my commission."/pause 500/move Aideen 3 0 3/move Aideen -3 0 2/speak Aideen "Oh.. however shall I make it up to you!"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/jump Aideen 3/textAboveHead Aideen "I know!"/pause 500/speak Aideen "The villagers speak fondly of you, @. You have made many friends. Do you have, perhaps, a sweetheart?"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/speak Aideen "Have you heard about Pierre's bouquets? Well, I shall let you in on a little secret."/move Aideen 0 1 2/speak Aideen "It is I who makes them for him.#$b#And now, I shall teach you my technique. Please, hand me the flowers."/playSound newRecipe/pause 500/speak Aideen "This is what you do..."/itemAboveHead/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addCraftingRecipe Bouquet/message "You've learned how to craft a bouquet!"/pause 1000/move Aideen 0 -1 2/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Aideen "Oh, I could not give you this one! *giggles*"/pause 500/emote farmer 12/speak Aideen "Very well, I shall pay you for the flowers. I trust this is sufficient reimbursement for your time."/playSound purchase/money 150/speak Aideen "Now, do not go and gift one to everyone! Or do. I imagine the result would be quite amusing.$1"/pause 1000/end dialogue Aideen "I spoke with Pierre; he has increased the cost of my bouquets, the fiend!$a#$b#But do not despair, for it also means yours may make a small profit."
Entries.57871008/e 57871007/f Aideen 2000/p Aide: breezy/-1000 -1000/farmer 10 23 0 Aideen 2 19 3/skippable/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/viewport 11 18/move farmer 0 -4 3/faceDirection Aideen 1/jump Aideen 3/pause 500/speak Aideen "Oh! You startled me!$3"/emote farmer 40/speak Aideen "My apologies... I am not myself. I have just received a phone call that has quite shaken me to the core.$2"/move farmer -5 0 3/emote farmer 16/move Aideen 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Aideen "A blast from the past, as they say...#$b#His name was Frederik. Freddy. And we were an item, but now he is betrothed - and wishes for me to provide the flowers!"/emote farmer 8/speak Aideen "Don't trouble yourself, it's fine. He and I... we were not well matched.$6#$b#I was more in love with the thought of being in love than I was with him.$3#$b#I don't doubt he has found himself a more appropriate companion. It is just..."/stopMusic/pause 1500/faceDirection Aideen 0/pause 500/playMusic desolate/pause 500/speak Aideen "It is foolish, I know...$2#$b#but all the tales I have read, the movies I have watched... I had thought, by now, that I might have found my knight, my one True Love.$4"/faceDirection Aideen 1/speak Aideen "I wish for someone sophisticated, with a sense of refinement. One who is kind, and can engage in lively dialogue.#$b#It is not too much to ask, is it just?"/pause 1000/speak Aideen "$q 5787101 null#...#$r 5787102 50 Aideen_102#Perhaps your True Love is living right next door?#$r 5787103 0 Aideen_103#Have you considered letting a humble farmer sweep you off your feet?#$r 5787104 25 Aideen_104#Who needs love when you have cats?#$r 5787105 -25 Aideen_105#Love? Love is a lie."/pause 1000/emote Aideen 40/pause 1000/speak Aideen "You have given me much to consider, @, but I must start planning for this wedding.#$b#I cannot believe it! Freddy is to be married!$1#$b#Thank you, and good day.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 2000/end
Entries.57871010/e 57871009/n Aideen_10HeartInvi: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Aideen 14 19 0/addTemporaryActor Munchboi 32 32 11 19 3 false/showFrame Munchboi 27/skippable/viewport 11 20/pause 1000/speak Aideen "Oh dear, you poor thing... is that a spot on your little leaf?$2#$b#Time for a little dusting of bicarbonate, is it?$2"/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 10 23 0/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 2/jump Aideen 3/pause 500/speed Aideen 5/move Aideen 0 1 2/speak Aideen "Good morning @! You made it!$1#$b#I had almost given up on you."/move farmer 0 -3 1 true/move Aideen -3 0 3 true/pause 1000/speak Aideen "You are all ready for our expedition?"/emote farmer 32/textAboveHead Aideen "Excellent!"/faceDirection Aideen 0/faceDirection Munchboi 2/speak Aideen "Now you be a good boy while we're gone, Baron Munchington."/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 1000/faceDirection Aideen 2/textAboveHead Aideen "Let's go."/move Aideen 0 2 0 true/move farmer 0 2 0 true/pause 500/fade/viewport -100 -100/warp Munchboi -1000 -1000/playMusic {{season}}1/changeLocation Custom_EastScarpe/viewport -100 -100/pause 1000/warp Aideen 63 31/warp farmer 64 31/viewport 62 31/move Aideen 0 -5 3 true/move farmer 0 -5 1 true/pause 1500/speak Aideen "Miss Eloise has tried to convince me that a troll lives under this bridge.$2#$b#Such an active imagination!$7"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Aideen 0/speak Aideen "Anyway, must not drag our heels - it's quite a hike!"/jump farmer 3/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/move Aideen 0 -3 1 true/move farmer 0 -3 0 true/pause 1500/viewport -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap DeepMountainsAideen/viewport -100 -100/pause 2000/warp Aideen 46 48/warp farmer 47 49/viewport 47 48/emote Aideen 8/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Aideen "Oh, it's a campfire. And see! The coals are still warm!$3"/jump farmer 3/faceDirection Aideen 0/faceDirection Aideen 3/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 2/speak Aideen "Not a soul to be seen! Most intriguing."/playSound sheep/jump farmer 3/playSound sheep/emote farmer 16/speak Aideen "Oh, do not be startled, @. According to Dr. Jacob, wild goats roam around here. Nothing to be afraid of.$2"/pause 500/textAboveHead Aideen "Come along now."/move Aideen -2 0 0/move farmer -3 0 1 true/move Aideen 0 -3 0 true/fade/viewport -100 -100/pause 1000/warp Aideen 45 29/warp farmer 44 29/viewport 45 28/speak Aideen "Oh... I'm sure it is nothing. We have come too far to be detered now, have we not?$6"/jump farmer 3/move Aideen 1 0 3 true/move farmer 1 0 0 true/pause 1000/Message "KEEP OUT!^^Trespazzes shellbee imolatted."/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 16/speak Aideen "I refuse to be detered by a childish sign! This is clearly the work of children...$5#$b#Children sorely in need of a better education!$3"/textAboveHead Aideen "Step aside."/move farmer 0 1 0/move Aideen -4 0 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Aideen "You are coming, yes @? It would be terrible if anything were to happen, without you there to protect me.$6"/jump farmer 3/speed farmer 5/move farmer -2 0 0/faceDirection Aideen 0/fade/viewport -100 -100/warp farmer 35 15/warp Aideen 33 15/faceDirection Aideen 3 true/faceDirection farmer 3 true/viewport 29 14/jump Aideen 5/speed Aideen 5/move Aideen -5 0 0/emote Aideen 20/move farmer -3 0 1/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 100/move farmer -2 0 1/faceDirection Aideen 1/speak Aideen "Isn't it the most absolutely glorious bloom you have ever set your eyes upon?$7"/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Aideen "Oh, do not be so wary, @! I have no intent to harm it... Merely to admire it."/stopMusic/move Aideen -3 0 0/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Aideen "...And maybe to take a cutting. Or perhaps...$6"/emote farmer 12/pause 1000/speak Aideen "Oh, do not be such a killjoy, @. It is growing like a weed. Surely a single seedling shall not be miss-$2"/playSound fireball/jump Aideen 5/speak Aideen "What was that? Let's go!$5"/faceDirection farmer 1/speed farmer 5/speed Aideen 5/move farmer 5 0 1 true/move Aideen 5 0 1 true/pause 1500/fade/viewport -100 -100/playSound fireball/pause 1000/speak Aideen "Whew, I do not think we're being followed.$2"/pause 1000/changeLocation Custom_EastScarpe/warp Aideen 61 17/warp farmer 62 17/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Aideen 1 true/viewport 61 17/pause 1000/speak Aideen "That was impressive. I have never seen anyone run so fast!$1"/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/speak Aideen "Thank you, @. I really do mean that. It was quite an adventure!$7"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Aideen "Did I get a seedling? Errr...$6"/faceDirection Aideen 3/pause 500/textAboveHead Aideen "Yes..."/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/end dialogue Aideen "I am sad to say, but my seedling failed to flourish.$2#$b#Perhaps I could persuade you to accompany me on a return visit, some day?$4"

Entries.57871007/f Aideen 1500/t 700 1400: continue/16 54/farmer 10 55 1 Aideen -100 -100 2/addTemporaryActor Munchboi 32 32 -100 -100 3 false/addConversationTopic Jacob_Munchboi 7/skippable/move farmer 7 0 1/playSound doorOpen/warp Aideen 16 49/emote Aideen 56/faceDirection farmer 0/speed Aideen 5/move Aideen 0 5 2/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/speak Aideen "It is terrible, absolutely terrible! Baron Munchington has vanished!!$3"/emote farmer 16/speak Aideen "It was horrendously stuffy last night, so I left the window open...$2"/shake Aideen 240/pause 500/speak Aideen "He must have snuck out!$a#$b#Oh, my poor sweet boy, there are so many fiendish things out here!$2#$b#And he failed to came home for breakfast...$s"/pause 500/quickQuestion #He'll be home when he's hungry.#Something probably ate him.(break)speak Aideen "That is what I thought too! But he did not!$2"(break)friendship Aideen -50\speak Aideen "How dare you suggest such a thing?!!$a"/pause 500/shake Aideen 5/speak Aideen "Poor foolish Munchington, he must be so scared!$2#$b#What if he's hurt... or trapped... and cannot come home?"/question fork0 "...#I'll help you find him.#He's a cat... he'll come home when he's ready."/fork FindMunchie/pause 500/emote Aideen 12/pause 1000/move Aideen 0 1 3/move Aideen -7 0 0/textAboveHead Aideen "Munchington!"/pause 500/move farmer 0 7 2/fade/end
Entries.FindMunchie: pause 500/emote Aideen 20/speak Aideen "Thank you, @. I knew you were to be relied upon."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Aideen "Where is he most likely to be? Hmm..."/faceDirection Aideen 0/emote Aideen 40/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 3/pause 500/faceDirection Aideen 2/pause 500/speak Aideen "He is an unadventurous soul, taking pleasure in comfort and companionship."/jump farmer 3/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Aideen "The inn? Yes, that is an excellent suggestion for both food and companionship.#$b#May I depend upon you to check there? I shall speak with Dr. Jacob. Perhaps he has found his way into the barn."/move Aideen 0 1 1/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/move Aideen -3 0 3 true/move farmer 0 3 2 true/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Aideen -100 -100/pause 500/warp farmer 33 68/viewport 42 68/move farmer 6 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 16/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 500/playSound cat/jump farmer 5/emote farmer 16/faceDirection farmer 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 1000/emote farmer 56/warp Munchboi 44 66/emote Munchboi 40/faceDirection Munchboi 2/playSound cat/shake Munchboi 350/pause 500/message "Poor Baron Munchington looks like he's had a rough night."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Munchboi 16 54/warp Aideen 6 55/warp farmer 17 55/speed Aideen 5/move Aideen 9 0 0 true/pause 100/viewport 16 54/pause 2000/faceDirection Munchboi 3/playSound cat/pause 1000/speak Aideen "Oh you poor baby! Look at your little face, you're all covered with scratches!$2"/move Aideen 0 -1 1/playSound cat/pause 500/speak Aideen "Did you have a run-in with that little stray? My poor Munchie!$2"/positionOffset Munchboi -16 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Aideen 1/speak Aideen "Thank you for bringing him home, @. It means a lot to me.$4"/emote Aideen 20/faceDirection Aideen 0/speak Aideen "Now, you poor foolish boy, let's get you checked over by nice Dr. Jacob.$1"/playSound cat/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/end

Entries.AideenFlowerRequest: Dear @,^I have need of assistance: My supplier has suffered most dire circumstances and is unable to supply my latest order.^I absolutely MUST have the following flowers: a sweet pea, a tulip and a blue jazz. If you could please bring them to my house at the earliest possible convenience. I would be eternally grateful - and in your debt, ^Thank you, Aideen %item quest 578 %% [#]Aideen's Request
Entries.AideenSendsFlowerSeedsSpring: Dear @,^It really would be most advantageous if I were able to source my flowers locally. Perhaps would you care to plant these for me?, ^Thank you,^Aideen. %item object 429 5 %% [#]Spring seeds from Aideen
Entries.AideenSendsFlowerSeedsSummer: Dear @,^It really would be most advantageous if I were able to source my flowers locally. Perhaps would you care to plant these for me?, ^Thank you,^Aideen. %item object 455 5 %% [#]Summer seeds from Aideen
Entries.AideenSendsFlowerSeedsFall: Dear @,^It really would be most advantageous if I were able to source my flowers locally. Perhaps would you care to plant these for me?, ^Thank you,^Aideen. %item object 425 3 %% [#]Fall seeds from Aideen
Entries.Aideen_10HeartInvite: Dear @,^I have heard rumors of a most mysterious and beautiful flower that grows deep in the mountains, and I was wondering if you would care to join me on an expedition!^Please, meet me at my house tomorrow morning.^^Kindest regards, Aideen. [#]Aideen's Invitation.

Entries.458: Bouquet/175/-300/Basic/Bouquet/A gift that shows your romantic interest.

Entries.578: Basic/Aideen requires flowers/Aideen needs to create a very special bouquet./Bring a Tulip, Blue Jazz, Sweet Pea to Aideen's house/-1/-1/ 0/-1/true

Entries.Aideen0: Oh! I am all a-fluster. We are to be married!$4
Entries.Aideen1: Everything is completely under control, @. And we shall have the most fantastic flowers.$1

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Aideen in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Aideen in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Aideen... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Aideen... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h
